description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (instance) (jvm_memory_used{job="$job", area="heap", env="$env"})*100/sum by (instance) (jvm_memory_max{job="$job", area="heap", env="$env"}))
topk(10, sum by (instance) (jvm_memory_used{job="$job", env="$env", area="nonheap"})*100/sum by(instance) (jvm_memory_max{job="$job", env="$env", area="nonheap"}))
topk(10, sum by (instance) (rate(http_server_requests_sum{job="$job", env="$env", status!~"5.."}[1m]))/sum by (instance) (rate(http_server_requests_count{job="$job", env="$env", status!~"5.."}[1m])))

title: JVM (Micrometer Top 10)
